boat.name: Loon
boat.full_description:
'Loon', advertised for sale in Gaffers Log: 1978/4

Gaff cutter built J Miller in 1931 to the design of Maurice Griffiths. Pitch pine on oak, pine decks painted Trawler Red Decolay, varnished teak coachroof and cockpit, oiled gunwhales and covering boards. Perkins 4.99 36hp diesel, rebuilt 1973 with TMP hydraulic gearbox, overhauled 1978. Accommodation includes four berths, marine toilet, gimballed gas cooker, chart table. Excellent inventory, extensively refitted over four years and in lovely condition. Shallow draft double ended hull makes her ideal for creek hopping whilst giving excellent motion in seaway. Lying Mitchells Boatyard, Poole Harbour.

'Gairloch' ex 'Loon' advertised for sale in Gaffers Log: 1970/2

10 ton cutter, ex centreboard. Maurice Griffiths design, built 1931 M. Miller. Larch on oak, pine deck, teak coachroof. 4 berth + pipecot. Calor oven and grill. Perkins 499 diesel, variable pitch propellor. New terylene working sails (tan) and storm, medium jib. Topsail and spinnaker in cotton. Chart table, echo sounder, lifebelts and all necessary gear. Fast shoal draught cruiser in very good order. Two thirds and one second in Old Gaffers South Coast races.
